name: private-kfexperimentrun-async
author: CSE-DevOps
helpMarkDown: Create new Kubeflow pipeline run from agentless job without holding build agent until completion

inputs.name: kubeflowEndpoint
inputs.label: Kubeflow API Endpoint Base URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Kubeflow API endpoint base URL format http://yourURL/

inputs.name: bearerToken
inputs.label: Bearer Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do not input raw tokens. Read more on how to handle secrets https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/pipelines/process/variables?view=azure-devops&tabs=yaml%2Cbatch#secret-variables

inputs.name: pipelineVersionID
inputs.label: Pipeline Version Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pipeline Version Id (Not Pipeline Version Name).

inputs.name: runName
inputs.label: Run Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of new experiment run.

inputs.name: waitForCompletion
inputs.label: Wait For Completion
inputs.helpMarkDown: Waits for completion by sending additional pipeline parameter (azdocallbackinfo) with callback details to send event back to AzureDevOps.
